attributes.action: Close primary schools till the 18th of january
attributes.additional_details: The new variant makes it even more imperative.
attributes.background: Because of the rising numbers in covid cases primary schools should also be closed because just because younger children dont get as ill from it does not mean they are not passing it to the people they live with who then in turn are passing it on to people they work with.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561988

Since you started your petition the Government has announced that primary schools, secondary schools and colleges across England must move to remote provision from 5 January 2021, except for vulnerable children and the children of key workers.

You can read the Prime Minister's announcement of new Covid-19 restrictions, including school closures, here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
